div.p: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

I think it is more important to have an enjoyable job because you work every days.If you make a lot of money but you don't like your work, you can't be happy happy.The day will be long and bad.If i choose my job, it is really not a problem to work every day for less money.THe must important thing is to like what you do.You can also make much money if you are interesting in your work because you will be motivate to do your best.An enjoyable job it is the key.
